text: Piet Schrijvers (15 December 1946 â€“ 7 September 2022) was a Dutch professional football manager and player. He was a goalkeeper. He appeared 46 times for the Netherlands national football team from 1971 to 1984. Schrijvers died on 7 September 2022 from illness originating from Alzheimer's disease at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Dutch football managers Category:Dutch footballers Category:Sportspeople from Utrecht (province)
title: Piet Schrijvers
